directions: Preheat vegetable oil over medium heat in a non-stick skillet.
Add in chopped onion and bell pepper, cook until soften and lightly browned.
Add in minced pork, season with salt and pepper and cook until lightly browned.
Add in ketchup, water and sweetener, mix well and bring to the boil.
Remove from heat and transfer to a serving dish.
Serve as topping for low carb pasta or spaghetti squash.
ingredients: 3/4 cup homemade sugar-free ketchup* (refer recipe below)
title: Onion Tomato Sauce Minced Pork (for Atkins Diet Phase 1)
